column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Last time I checked
column2: the entrance fee was about $10 per
column3: plus coat check fees (no carrying bags in!).  Tuesdays are free days though
column4: so definitely try to hit it then.  The first time I entered the museum for an art history class I ended up spending 3 or 4 hours
column5: partially because I had to write things down
column6: but also partially because it's easy to get lost in.  It's not uncommon to find students sitting around and drawing what they see
column7: and security is pretty lenient about that sort of thing.  It depends on your artistic tastes how much you will enjoy this
column8: but it's one of the big "things" to see when you're in the city so at least visit once.
